name: Junior Front End Developer (React)
description:
Codabrasoft is a boutique full-cycle mobile & game development company, which helps small & mid-sized companies all over the world to plan, build, and launch mobile applications and casual games.

We’re growing our Front-end development team at the moment, and looking for a talented and goal-oriented person to work on our outsourcing projects.

If you're willing to learn new technologies and domains, please, apply!

p.s. we consider candidates with at least B1 English level!

Required skills:

  • Basic knowledge of Javascript/Event loop;

  • Understanding how to work with data set and objectives;

  • Understanding how to work with DOM/ ES6+/events/ Promises;

  • Basic knowledge of HTML5 + CSS3 /Adaptive layout/ flex/ grid;

  • Good spoken and written English (at least B1 and higher).

Nice to have:

  • Basic knowledge of React, react hooks;

  • Knowing of preprocessors;

  • Knowing of Typescript (types, interface, enum);

  • Understanding of Mobx/ Redux;

  • Familiar with Git;

  • Bootstrap.

We offer:

  • Warm and friendly corporate culture;

  • Work in a dynamically developing High-Tech Park resident company;

  • Competitive salary protected from inflation and exchange rate fluctuations;

  • Opportunities for professional growth;

  • Work with highly qualified specialists;

  • Clear and constructive feedback, that helps to improve hard skills;

  • Events and team-buildings;

  • English classes;

  • Work in the modern office in the city center, close to the metro station "Petrovschina";

  • Tea, coffee, cookies, and a good atmosphere.

We look forward to seeing you as a part of our team!

p.s. this position requires a test task!
